page.title: 18Kimbolton - Smaller Schools
page.content: {Overhills County Primary School}moved from Victorian buildings in Grass Yard to a new site in Newtown in 1974.There are 89 pupils aged 5-11,a teaching headmaster and three assistant teachers.Most children go on to Longsands Community College in St Neots,or to Hinchingbrooke School in Huntingdon,or to Kimbolton School. {Stonely Grange School}is a small independent school for boys and girls 5-8,for girls only from 8 upwards. There are 50 pupils,including some girl boarders. {Kimbolton Nursery School}has 25 children aged 3-5 on roll,and is situated in Carnaby.Children attend two or three times a week,as there is a limit to the number who can be accommodated at any one time.
